acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.config: Collateral token configurations including swap and market parameters.

params.amountCollateral: Amount of collateral is being supplied.
params.loanToken: The stablecoin loan token (eg: USDC, DAI, USR, ...).

returns._0: amountToBorrow Amount of stablecoin that can be borrowed.

params.morphoAddress: Address of the Morpho protocol contract.
params.pendleRouter: Address of the Pendle router for swap execution.

params.amountCollateral: Amount of collateral token to value.

returns._0: valueInLoanToken Value of collateral amount in loan token terms (18 decimals).

params.collateralToken: The address of the collateral token used in the leverage position.
params.loanToken: The address of the token borrowed in the core leverage position.

returns._0: position The manager's core leverage position including collateral amount and borrowed shares.

getLiqLtv(address,address).details: This is the maximum LTV before a position becomes liquidatable.

params.collateralToken: Token used as collateral in the position.

returns.amountRepay: Equivalent amount in loan token required for repayment.

params.params: Struct containing leverage parameters including collateral, loan token, collateral amount, and other swap configs.

onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes).details: Delegates handling to either _handleLeverage or _handleUnleverage based on Action enum.

params.data: Encoded data used to determine action and pass parameters.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Intentionally disabled to retain upgradeability and collateral support management.

setManager(address,bool).details: Only the contract owner can modify manager permissions.

params.manager: The address to set manager status for.
params.value: True to grant manager status, false to revoke it.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.params: Struct containing all parameters required to unwind leverage, including token addresses, shares to burn, collateral withdrawal amount, and swap/limit order data.

addSupportedCollateralToken((address,byt.notice: Allows owner to add support for new collateral tokens.

calcFlashLoanAmount(address,address,uint.notice: Calculates the maximum loan amount based on the amount collateral and safe LTV.

getCollateralValueInLoanToken(address,ad.notice: Returns the loan token value of a collateral token amount.

getCoreLeveragePosition(address,address,.notice: Returns the core leverage position of a manager for a given collateral and loan token pair.

getLiqLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the liquidation loan-to-value ratio for a given collateral-loan token pair.

getMaxLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the max loan-to-value ratio after applying the liquidation buffer.

getSafeLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the safe LTV used for leverage calculations after applying liquidation and slippage buffer.

getSharesToAsset(address,address,uint256.notice: Calculates the amount of loan token needed to repay borrowed shares.

leverage((address,address,uint256,(uint2.notice: Creates/Modifies manager's leveraged positions by supplying stable PT-collateral and borrowing stablecoins via flashloan.

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides renounceOwnership to prevent ownership renunciation.

setManager(address,bool).notice: Sets or revokes manager status for a given address.

unleverage((address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Closes or reduces an existing leveraged position and returns the remaining amount (in loan token) to the position owner.
